item.title: The Divine Lullaby
item.description:
The story of Queen Madālasā’s Lullaby holds a special place in due to its deep meaning in explaining life’s core truths in the form of lullaby.

The story of Queen Madālasā is in Chapters 25-30 of the Mārkaṇḍeya Purāṇa. The Mārkaṇḍeya is one of the eighteen ‘great Purāṇas’ (Mahāpurāṇas) relating to Brahmā, said to have been narrated by the Riṛṣi Mārkaṇḍeya.

item.title: Rich Content B
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
